Code Prompt Optimizer Installer
==========================

This installer will set up Code Prompt Optimizer on your system.

Requirements:
- Python 3.7 or newer
- Windows operating system

Installation Steps:
1. Double-click install.bat
2. Wait for the installation to complete
3. Find CodePromptOptimizer.exe on your Desktop

To uninstall:
1. Double-click uninstall.bat

Note: If you see any security warnings, you may need to right-click the batch files
and select "Run as administrator".
